articles.title: Pelosi clears way for Trump’s impeachment trial to begin
articles.description: Speaker Pelosi says she plans to send articles of impeachment to Senate early next week, as Trump faces new controversy about his decision to kill an Iranian general.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Is Trump trying to silence his former National Security Adviser?
articles.description: Trump signals he’ll block impeachment testimony from John Bolton if he’s subpoenaed by the Senate. Michael Bender, Annie Karni, and Melanie Zanona join.
